wikitext.*:
The '''King of the Mark''', more commonly known to outsiders as the '''King of Rohan''', was the hereditary title of the monarchs of the realm of [[Rohan]], descendants of the [[Northmen]]. ==History== All of the Kings were of the same dynasty, the [[House of Eorl]], divided into separate Lines when a king was not succeeded by his direct male descendant (in both cases the sister-son of the king ascended the throne). ===First Line=== {| |align="right"|1. |[[Eorl]] ''the Young'', son of [[Léod]] |align="right"|{{TA|2510}} – {{TA|2545|n}} |- |align="right"|2. |[[Brego]] |align="right"|{{TA|2545}} – {{TA|2570|n}} |- |align="right"|3. |[[Aldor]] ''the Old'' |align="right"|{{TA|2570}} – {{TA|2645|n}} |- |align="right"|4. |[[Fréa]] |align="right"|{{TA|2645}} – {{TA|2659|n}} |- |align="right"|5. |[[Fréawine]] |align="right"|{{TA|2659}} – {{TA|2680|n}} |- |align="right"|6. |[[Goldwine]] |align="right"|{{TA|2680}} – {{TA|2699|n}} |- |align="right"|7. |[[Déor]] |align="right"|{{TA|2699}} – {{TA|2718|n}} |- |align="right"|8. |[[Gram]] |align="right"|{{TA|2718}} – {{TA|2741|n}} |- |align="right"|9. |[[Helm]] ''Hammerhand'' |align="right"|{{TA|2741}} – {{TA|2759|n}} |- | |colspan=2|''Helm's two sons were killed by the [[Dunlendings]] during the [[Long Winter]].
His sister-son, [[Fréaláf|Fréaláf Hildeson]], became the first king of the second line.'' |} ===Second Line=== {| |align="right"|10. |[[Fréaláf]] ''Hildeson'' |align="right"|{{TA|2759}} – {{TA|2798|n}} |- |align="right"|11. |[[Brytta]] ''Léofa'' |align="right"|{{TA|2798}} – {{TA|2842|n}} |- |align="right"|12. |[[Walda]] |align="right"|{{TA|2842}} – {{TA|2851|n}} |- |align="right"|13. |[[Folca]] ''the Hunter'' |align="right"|{{TA|2851}} – {{TA|2864|n}} |- |align="right"|14. |[[Folcwine]] |align="right"|{{TA|2864}} – {{TA|2903|n}} |- |align="right"|15. |[[Fengel]] |align="right"|{{TA|2903}} – {{TA|2953|n}} |- |align="right"|16. |[[Thengel]] |align="right"|{{TA|2953}} – {{TA|2980|n}} |- |align="right"|17. |[[Théoden]] ''Ednew'' |align="right"|{{TA|2980}} – {{TA|3019|n}} |- | |colspan=2|''Théoden's only son, [[Théodred]], was slain at [[First Battle of the Fords of Isen]].
His sister-son, [[Éomer]], became the first King of the third line.'' |} ===Third Line=== {| |align="right"|18. |[[Éomer]] ''Éadig'' |align="right"|{{TA|3019}} – {{FoA|63}} |- |align="right"|19. |[[Elfwine]] ''the Fair'' |align="right"|{{FoA|63}} – ''unknown'' |} ==See also== * [[House of Eorl]] [[Category:Kings of Rohan| ]] [[Category:Mannish titles]] [[Category:Rohan]] [[Category:Rulers in Middle-earth]] [[de:Haus Eorl]] [[fr:encyclo/personnages/hommes/3a/hommes du nord/rohirrim/rois du rohan]] [[fi:Rohanin kuninkaat]]
